sentences.en: All their beds were distinctive; Mac'swas an iron affair with brass knobs.
sentences.cn: 他们的床都各具特色；马克的床是张带球形黄铜柱头的铁家伙。

sentences.en: Brass is an alloy of copper and zinc.
Brass is formed by the fusion of copper and zinc.
sentences.cn: 黄铜是通过铜和锌的熔合而成的.

sentences.en: Formerly most of our household utensils were made of brass.
sentences.cn: 以前我们家庭用的器皿多数是用黄铜做的.

sentences.en: He once again raised his baton and brought in the brass.
sentences.cn: 他再次举起指挥棒，让铜管乐部加入进来。

sentences.en: He walked in , bold as brass, wearing nothing but his underpants.
sentences.cn: 他走了进来, 只穿一条衬裤,极为厚颜无耻.

sentences.en: I felt loath to sully the gleaming brass knocker by handling it.
sentences.cn: 我不愿意伸手去抓那闪亮的黄铜门环，怕把它弄脏。

sentences.en: I read her name on the polished brass plate.
sentences.cn: 我在擦亮的黄铜门牌上看到了她的名字.

sentences.en: Its brass feet dented the carpet's thick pile.
sentences.cn: 其黄铜支脚把厚绒地毯压出了印。

sentences.en: Many of the workers play in the factory's brass band.
sentences.cn: 许多工人都在工厂铜管乐队中演奏.

sentences.en: Number 30 has a red door and a brass knocker.
sentences.cn: 30号有一扇红门和一幅铜门环.

sentences.en: she hasn't got two brass farthings to rub together.
The brass are reluctant to fraternise with the enlisted men.
sentences.cn: 高级军官不愿意与大兵们称兄道弟。

sentences.en: The enamel gives new brass an authentically tarnished finish.
sentences.cn: 用瓷釉作末道漆使新的黄铜器看似自然地失去了光泽。

sentences.en: the fusion of copper and zinc to produce brass
They are available in polished brass, antique brass or silver-plate.
sentences.cn: 它们有哑铜的，古铜的和镀银的。

words.tran_cn: 刺耳的；厚脸皮的；似黄铜的
[材]黄铜；黄铜制品；铜管乐器；厚脸皮

phrases.tran_cn: n. 军乐队；黄铜带；吹奏乐队
基本事实；事实真相；黄铜平头钉
(英，非正式)厌烦的，恼怒的，满腹牢骚的
(北美，非正式)成功的机遇；发财的机会
[口]高级军官；[口]要员；[航海]顶部轴衬

trans.tran_cn: 黄铜（制品），铜管乐器，高级军官
trans.tran_en: a very hard bright yellow metal that is a mixture of  copper  and  zinc
